thread.section_title: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ocean County Veterinary Hospital | ocvh.com
thread.title: Linda R.
thread.title_full: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital reviewed by Linda R.

author: Linda R.
title: Linda R.
text: Excellent experience - staff was very friendly and professional- Dr Danowitz is extremely caring and knowledgeable- my cat was very scared and didn't know how he was going to act but Dr Danowitz was able to examine him with no problem. He also answered all of our questions- a couple of days later the office called to see how my cat was doing - I will recommend them to my friends and family
